CustomField.description: Used to determine the approval process. Any modifications to this formula should be done in parallel with Total_Suggested_Settlement_Cost__c to ensure alignment. Max of total override amount or the calculation is used. ClaimsV2-590 https://ikoussfsc.atlassian.net/browse/CLAIMSV2-590
CustomField.formula: MAX( BLANKVALUE(Settlement_Amount__c,0) , IF( TEXT(Settlement_Type__c) = 'Money or Material Offer', ( MAX( Bundle_Material_Value__c, Cash_Value_of_Settlement_Bundles__c ) ), IF( OR(TEXT(Settlement_Type__c) = 'Cash Settlement',TEXT(Settlement_Type__c) = 'Cash Settlement - Material Only'), IF(NOT(ISBLANK(Settlement_Amount__c)), Settlement_Amount__c,Cash_Value_of_Settlement_Bundles__c ), IF( TEXT(Settlement_Type__c) = 'Hand Seal', Hand_Seal_Material_Settlement_Cost__c, Bundle_Material_Value__c ) ) ) + IF( AND( OR(TEXT(Settlement_Type__c) = 'Cash Settlement',TEXT(Settlement_Type__c) = 'Cash Settlement - Material Only'), NOT(ISBLANK(Settlement_Amount__c)) ), Total_Cost_of_Additional_Settlement_Item__c, Actual_Labor_Total__c + Total_Cost_of_Additional_Settlement_Item__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Used to determine the total amount of the settlement for the approval process.
CustomField.label: Settlement Total (Pre-Tax)
